title: Errors in COSP variables clcalipso2, climodis, cltmodis and clwmodis
description: An error was detected in CNRM-CM6-1/CNRM-ESM2-1 output for the following COSP variables : clcalipso2, climodis, cltmodis and clwmodis (Tables Emon and E3hrPt). CNRM-CM6-1 amip simulation has been rerun and republished on ESGF
